name: Elite Fury Army Combat
description:
Elite Fury Army Combat is the best realistic and unique action shooting game. You are not a contract killer, you feel as a real army best commando, who save own city to hazardous criminal and protect your country in any difficult time. Elite Fury Army Combat is full action pack game it’s absolutely free

GAME FEATURES:
* Challenging Environment
* Multiple Challenging Missions
* Play it Anywhere, Offline Shooting Game
* Thrilling Fights between Commandos and Terrorist
* Modern weaponry especially Sniper
* Real Shooting Experience
* Stunning graphics and realistic Environment
